title: Fashion for spring carnival season
text:
Jobs data propels Wall St to best day since August A rally in technology stocks led by Apple also helped lift the benchmark indexes at the end of a rollercoaster week.

Opinion

World politics Did Iran just pull a fast one? Hope for a swap of political prisoners held in Iran - including eight Americans and Australians and at least one Brit - have faded.

Opinion

Interest rates Bond traders locked in their Fed bets way before jobs day September's US payrolls report never had a chance at truly mattering to the bond market, writes Brian Chappatta.
description: In partnership with Harrolds, LUXURY magazine presents witty twists on fascinating hat tricks for the racetrack.
